symptomAnalyzerDescription: Describe your symptoms, and our AI will suggest potential over-the-counter medicines and relevant medical specialties. This tool is for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical advice.
symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., I have a runny nose, mild cough, and a slight headache...
analysisResultsDescription: Below are AI-generated suggestions based on the symptoms you provided. Remember, this is not medical advice.
suggestedMedicinesInfo: The following are general suggestions. Always read medicine labels and consult a healthcare professional before taking any medication.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyInfo: For symptoms like these, or if considering the suggested medicines, you might consult a specialist in: {specialty}.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyDisclaimer: This is an AI-generated suggestion and may not always be accurate or necessary.
noMedicineSuggestionsInfo: Based on the symptoms provided, we couldn't identify specific over-the-counter medicine suggestions at this time, or the symptoms may require professional medical evaluation. Please consult a healthcare provider.
footerDisclaimer: This application is for informational purposes only and does not provide medical advice. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or before making any decisions related to your health or treatment.
locationPlaceholderPharmacies: e.g., New York, NY or 90210 (for Pharmacies)
locationPlaceholderHospitals: e.g., Los Angeles, CA or 90001 (for Hospitals)
aiGeneratedDataDisclaimer: The information below (including for {location}{specialtyString}) is AI-generated and may not be real, accurate, or current. {disclaimer} Always verify information independently.
noDataGenerated: No illustrative {entity} data could be generated for {location}{specialtyString} at this moment. Please try a different location or broaden your search.
validationMaxChars: Please enter no more than {count} characters.
validationLocationMinChars: Location must be at least {count} characters.
validationLocationMaxChars: Location must be no more than {count} characters.
validationSpecialtyMaxChars: Specialty must be no more than {count} characters.
validationFailedMessage: Please correct the errors below and try again.
errorDuringAnalysisMessage: An error occurred during symptom analysis.
errorDuringSearchMessage: An error occurred while searching for {entity_plural}.
adminLoginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
createPostDescription: Fill in the details below to publish a new article to the MediSeek blog.
postContentPlaceholder: Write your blog post content here...
postExcerptPlaceholder: Write a short summary or teaser for the post...
blogPostCreationError: Could not create the blog post.
totalPostsDescription: Number of articles published on the blog.
welcomeAdminDescription: This is your control center for MediSeek.
dashboardOverviewContent: From here, you can manage blog posts, view site statistics (feature coming soon), and oversee other administrative tasks. Use the sidebar to navigate through different sections.
